goal_meta_link_text: United Nations Sustainable Development Goals Metadata (PDF 208 KB)
graph_title: Proportion de jeunes femmes et hommes de 18 à 29 ans ayant été victimes de violences sexuelles avant l’âge de 18 ans
indicator_definition: This indicator provides the proportion of young women and men aged 18-24 years who report having experienced any sexual violence by age 18. It is calculated by dividing the number of young women and men aged 18-24 years who report having experienced any sexual violence by age 18 by the total number of young women and men aged 18-24 years, respectively, in the population
indicator_name: Proportion de jeunes femmes et hommes de 18 à 29 ans ayant été victimes de violences sexuelles avant l’âge de 18 ans
target_name: Mettre un terme à la maltraitance, à l’exploitation et à la traite, et à toutes les formes de violence et de torture dont sont victimes les enfants
